description: Perona was the Zombie Animal and Zombie Ambush Commander of Thriller Bark before the collapse of Gekko Moriah`s zombie army. She is able to produce ghosts from her body through the powers of the Horo Horo no Mi. She was one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark arc, being one of the Mysterious Four, but has since become sort of an ally.
name: Perona
